dialogue.text: I don't see people here very often.
dialogue.response: Why do you stay on the sidelines?
Are you the author of the letter?

dialogue.text: I don't like the hustle and bustle of the city. I prefer to walk along the coast and listen to the sound of the sea.
Yes, I wanted to share with you information about the evil that has taken over the island.
dialogue.response: So let's get to the point.

dialogue.text: I saw a Mage enter a cave in the desert, west of here. Monsters didn't attack him.
Go to his place as soon as possible.
dialogue.response: I will do that, thanks for everything.
